description: Redunera is an adaptive, logic-enhanced renal therapeutic engineered to preserve eGFR and suppress inflammatory deterioration in CKD patients with Type 2 Diabetes and/or Hypertension. Developed independently using SEI-guided Moleculogic design, Redunera integrates precision delivery, entropy stabilization, and feedback-aware immune logic.
